product_name: Black Diamond Alpine Carbon Solo Trekking Pole
long_description: The light and compact Black Diamond Alpine Carbon Solo trekking pole gives you added stability when hiking and stows easily in your pack. 100% carbon fiber shafts keep weight to a minimum; dual FlickLocks provide easy adjustability. Natural cork grip features a dual-density top and 360deg Nubuck straps. The Black Diamond Alpine Carbon Solo trekking pole comes with a carbide tip and low-profile trekking basket.
short_description: The light and compact Black Diamond Alpine Carbon Solo trekking pole gives you added stability when hiking and stows easily in your pack.
